caption: It was snowing in the sky, and two women met a man while holding umbrellas. A group of workers in blue uniforms were loading things onto a truck. A woman got into the vehicle. Later, he went inside a building to make a phone call. Upstairs, a woman in black clothing answered the phone. Soon, the two of them met, and they walked through the building. Afterwards, they appeared in a dressing room. Many people gathered on both sides of the red carpet. People took their seats. On the stage, a man in a suit stood in front of a microphone, looking at the audience below.
